meanings.definition: A waterproof coat worn to protect against rain.
meanings.sent1: I always wear my raincoat when it's raining outside.
meanings.sent2: She grabbed her raincoat before heading out into the storm.
meanings.sent3: The raincoat kept him dry as he danced in the rain.
meanings.sent4: Her bright yellow raincoat was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The raincoat was his shield against the relentless downpour.
